derivation.yuyuan_name: from Sanskrit avatāra 'descent', from ava 'down' + tar- 'to cross'

means.word_mean: 1. a new personification of a familiar idea;
2. the manifestation of a Hindu deity (especially Vishnu) in human or superhuman or animal form;

sentences.sentence: "the Buddha is considered an avatar of the god Vishnu"
